ccipSend(uint64,(bytes,bytes,(address,ui.details: Note if msg.value is larger than the required fee (from getFee) we accept the overpayment with no refund.Reverts with appropriate reason upon invalid message.

params.message: The cross-chain CCIP message including data and/or tokens

returns._0: The address of the RMN proxy contract, formerly known as ARM

getFee(uint64,(bytes,bytes,(address,uint.details: Reverts with appropriate reason upon invalid message.

params.message: The cross-chain CCIP message including data and/or tokens

returns.fee: returns execution fee for the message delivery to destination chain, denominated in the feeToken specified in the message.

params.destChainSelector: The destination chain Id to get the onRamp for.

returns._0: The address of the ERC20 wrapped native.
is true if it is supported, false if not.

params.offRamp: The address of the offRamp to check.
params.sourceChainSelector: The source chain selector to check.

recoverTokens(address,address,uint256).details: Must be onlyOwner to avoid malicious token contract calls.

params.to: Destination address to send the tokens to.

routeMessage((bytes32,uint64,bytes,bytes.details: _callWithExactGas protects against return data bombs by capping the return data size at MAX_RET_BYTES.

returns.gasUsed: the gas used by the external customer call. Does not include any overhead.
returns.retData: A bytes array containing return data form CCIP receiver.
returns.success: A boolean value indicating whether the ccip message was received without errors.

params.wrappedNative: The address of the new wrapped native ERC20 token.

acceptOwnership().notice: Allows an ownership transfer to be completed by the recipient.

applyRampUpdates((uint64,address)[],(uin.notice: applyRampUpdates applies a set of ramp changes which provides the ability to add new chains and upgrade ramps.

ccipSend(uint64,(bytes,bytes,(address,ui.notice: Request a message to be sent to the destination chain

getArmProxy().notice: Gets the RMN address, formerly known as ARM

getOnRamp(uint64).notice: Returns the configured onramp for a specific destination chain.

getSupportedTokens(uint64).notice: This functionality has been removed and will revert when called.

getWrappedNative().notice: Gets the wrapped representation of the native fee coin.

isChainSupported(uint64).notice: Checks if the given chain ID is supported for sending/receiving.

isOffRamp(uint64,address).notice: Return true if the given offRamp is a configured offRamp for the given source chain.

recoverTokens(address,address,uint256).notice: Provides the ability for the owner to recover any tokens accidentally sent to this contract.
